name: THE TAILORED MAN
description:
The "TAILORED MAN" is a new design that actually transcends our everyday wears into the next level. The pocket on this design is actually holographic thus providing a visual illusion drawing in the creative spirits around you. This Tee is no where near basic, its an awesome piece that exudes happy energy right through its threads. Your sure to feel empowered upon it's wear.  

STYLES: 
This shirt comes in "BLACK" & "WHITE" with the option of variable holographic pockets. Check the  "Options" tab below. 

CONTENT IN TEXTILES: 
- 100% Modal (BASE FABRIC) 
- 100% POLYURETHANE (POCKET)

SIZING: 
XS, S, M, L, XL 
Please Note: The onesie is true to industry standard size and is designed to form fit. If you are looking for a more relaxed fit I would recommend ordering a size up.

WASH & CARE: 
Your personally constructed garment is of high quality fabric and requires a little more attention when it comes to care, as to keeping the creation as lively as possible for the duration of your wear. I recommend HAND or DELICATE machine washing by itself in COLD water followed by HANG or TUMBLE air drying. No Iron needed.

Remember these creations were made with passion, high quality fabric and a keen sense to detail. In saying such, please take care of them just as they look forward to taking care of you.

name: FREE THAT SPIRIT
description:
The "FREE THAT SPIRIT" tank top was designed to take you and your self empowerment to the next level. Through this tank top's visual energy you should feel empowered to become yourself and exude nothing less than good vibes for yourself and those around you! 

UNISEX

STYLES:
    This tank top is offered in two mesh textiles, "BLAZING BLUE" and "DEEP BLACK". These details can be found under the "OPTIONS" tab below. 

LADIES:
     Don't be scared! Totally hott in a stylish Bando, Bra or even more so FREELY!

TEXTILE CONTENTS:
     82% NYLON 18% SPANDEX MESH

SIZING:
     XS, S, M, L, XL  
Please Note: All sizes are of industry standard and are meant to drape somewhat from your body. Order size according to preference of fit. 

WASH & CARE: 
     Your personally constructed garment is of high quality fabric and requires a little more attention when it comes to care as to keeping the creation as lively as possible for the duration of your wear. I recommend HAND or DELICATE machine washing by itself in COLD water followed by HANG or TUMBLE air drying. If you feel the need to iron please turn the garment inside out and do so with LOW heat under minimal timing.  

     Remember these creations were made with passion, high quality fabric and a keen sense to detail. In saying such, please take care of them just as they look forward to taking care of you.
